teeb meem: Txhua yam uas siv qhov chaw thiab muaj huab hwm coj
keeb: Cov khoom ntshiab ua los ntawm ib hom atom nkaus xwb
atom: Chav tsev me tshaj plaws ntawm cov teeb meem uas tuaj yeem koom nrog cov tshuaj tiv thaiv tshuaj
compound: Cov khoom ua los ntawm ob lossis ntau lub ntsiab lus sib xyaw ua ke
molecule: Pawg ntawm atoms chemically bonded ua ke
sib tov: Kev sib xyaw ua ke ntawm ob lossis ntau yam tshuaj tsis sib xyaw ua ke
homogeneous: Kev sib xyaw nrog cov sib xyaw ua ke thoob plaws (piv txwv li, tov)
heterogeneous: Kev sib xyaw nrog cov tsis sib xws (piv txwv li, ncua kev kawm)
xeev: Daim ntawv uas muaj teeb meem (khoom, kua, roj, plasma)
khov kho: Lub xeev ntawm qhov teeb meem nrog meej cov duab thiab ntim
ua kua: Lub xeev ntawm teeb meem nrog meej ntim tab sis tsis muaj cov duab meej
gas: Lub xeev ntawm qhov teeb meem tsis muaj cov duab meej lossis ntim
tshuaj tiv thaiv: Cov txheej txheem uas cov tshuaj hloov mus ua cov tshuaj tshiab
reactant: Cov tshuaj hloov pauv hauv cov tshuaj tiv thaiv tshuaj
khoom: Cov tshuaj tshiab tsim nyob rau hauv ib qho tshuaj tiv thaiv
daim ntawv cog lus: Force tuav atoms ua ke nyob rau hauv ib tug molecule los yog compound
tshuaj formula: Txoj kev luv luv ntawm kev sawv cev ntawm cov khoom siv cov cim thiab cov lej
tshuaj sib npaug: Symbolic sawv cev ntawm cov tshuaj tiv thaiv tshuaj
daws: Homogeneous sib tov ntawm ib tug solute (solved substance) thiab ib tug hnyav (dissolving substance)
concentration: Tus nqi ntawm solute yaj nyob rau hauv ib tug muab tus nqi ntawm cov kuab tshuaj
kua qaub: Cov khoom uas pub hydrogen ions (H +) hauv dej
puag: Cov khoom uas lees txais hydrogen ions (H +) hauv dej
neutralization: Cov tshuaj tiv thaiv ntawm cov kua qaub thiab lub hauv paus, tsim cov ntsev thiab dej
chemical zog: Lub zog muaj peev xwm khaws cia hauv cov khoom siv tshuaj lom neeg ntawm cov khoom
